alert.note: Alert for Door (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 7:05PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Door County through 745 PM CDT... At 704 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Sturgeon Bay, moving east at 35 mph. Additional storms over the Bay will move into the county the next hour. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Jacksonport around 720 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
